content.rendered:
Medical Records Clerk | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-time position, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • 2+ years medical records experience preferred
  • Will be responsible for filing, chart assembly and requests
  • EMR use a plus
  • $10+/hour
